ride1.name: Log Ride
ride1.description: A log ride through the herbivore enclosure. Kid's stuff.

ride2.name: Mayan Mind Bender
ride2.description: A roller coaster enclosed in a fake temple. Definitely anachronistic but who cares. Dark coasters are hip. It's the 90's so technically not racist?

ride3.name: Whirly Pterodactyl
ride3.description: Dangerous and nauseating. Only for people who have no inner ears.

ride4.name: Pirates of the Pancreas
ride4.description: Not our IP but inspired by our IP so we're gonna take credit for it. Very unsettling. 18+ ONLY.

ride5.name: Tyrannocoaster
ride5.description: John said we needed one of those rides where your feet dangle over a pit of hungry T-Rex's. Legal says it's insane. Requires many consent forms.

ride6.name: Egg Spinner
ride6.description: It's not a copyright violation because it's eggs, not teacups and our lawyers said it was okay.

ride7.name: Cretaceous Cruise
ride7.description: Relaxing cruise on our fake river through our Cretaceous section. Basically, Log Ride but for adults. Bar Service.

ride8.name: Gondola Lift
ride8.description: Gondola takes you from Jurassic to Cretaceous Park, suspending the guests hundreds of feet above the enclosures. Breaks constantly.
